title: NFL Monday Night Football average viewers 2015 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Viewers in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 5.
Overall Viewers in millions has decreased over the Year.
Viewers in millions is slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2019.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Viewers in millions, of value 12.9 was reached at Year 2015
The lowest Viewers in millions, of value 10.76 was reported at Year 2017
